meanings.definition: A person who permits or allows something.
meanings.sent1: The permitters of the event made sure everyone had a good time.
meanings.sent2: The permitters granted access to the restricted area.
meanings.sent3: The permitters decided to allow the party to go on all night long!
meanings.sent4: The permitters opened the gates to a world of possibilities.
meanings.sent5: The permitters were like the gatekeepers of fun and excitement.

meanings.definition: Plural form of the word 'permitter', referring to multiple individuals who permit or allow something.
meanings.sent1: The permitters in the group all agreed to the new rules.
meanings.sent2: The permitters discussed the best course of action for the situation.
meanings.sent3: The permitters were feeling generous and decided to allow extra time for the project.
meanings.sent4: The permitters were like a council of wise elders, guiding the community.
meanings.sent5: The permitters worked together seamlessly to ensure everything ran smoothly.
